website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Pro Vision has the makings of a great on-court performer. The cushioning, materials, fit, support, and lockdown all do their job wonderfully. These mid-top basketball shoes also have a 90’s-inspired style that will surely make you stand out. The Pro Vision’s only drawback is its hit or miss traction.All things considered, the Pro Vision is still a good budget offering from Adidas. If you hoop outdoors or frequent clean indoor courts, then this basketball shoe is a no-brainer.
pros: Many are quick to comment that the Adidas Pro Vision looks really dope, almost as dope as the more popular Harden 3 and Dame 5
According to one tester, the Pro Vision’s traction works very well on clean courts
A reviewer notes that the rubber outsole is pretty thick
He says that outdoor use should be fine
One player thoroughly enjoyed the Bounce cushioning
According to him, the cushioning is really responsive, has good court feel, and feels plush at the heel
The lockdown and support are A+, a tester declares
There is no sliding inside the shoe, and the Achilles pillows keep the heel locked-in
These Adidas basketball shoes feel light on-foot, a player claims
The Adidas Pro Vision is a pretty comfortable basketball shoe, a reviewer asserts
cons: A reviewer is disappointed with the Pro Vision’s traction
According to him, the outsole loses its grip when playing on dusty courts
The materials feel cheap in hand, a tester remarks
These Adidas basketball shoes are very narrow, a player observes

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way they looked and felt but unfortunately these are not of good quality. After playing basketball with them 3 times indoors I noticed that one of them was tearing at the front Toe area. I'm just glad I didn't pay much ($39) but nonetheless it's money wasted. C'mon Adidas, you can do better!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Batista

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic looking shoes, the fit is a little small so you should go up half a size to accommodate. The shoes them selves are comfortable even with paper soles and lock you in with the ankle pillows. The herring bone pattern on the bottom is a little thin so the lose grip with dust on a wood court but but a quick wipe will keep you going. The bounce foam feels great and gives a small edge over regular sneakers. I highly recommend these shoes as they are fantastic court sneakers for the price
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM! YET, TIGHT FOR WIDE FEET..
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM! EVEN HAD TO BUY THE MATCHING GREEN BUCKET HAT FOR IT... CON: IF YOU HAVE WIDE FEET LIKE ME, YOU MIGHT WANT TO RETHINK.. THE SIDES OF THE SNEAKER HUGS UP ON YOUR FEET A BIT TIGHTLY.... I HAD TO WEAR THINNER SOCKS AND TAKE OUT THE INNER SOLE... IF THAT'S NOT SOMETHING YOU WOULD WANT TO DO FOR COMFORT, THEN LOOK ELSE WHERE....
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Good at first! 😡
customer_reviews.text: Originally I said, “Son loves the shoes! Says they feel great.” The shoes are only 6 months old and were purchased for basketball. Still being relatively new he wanted to use them for track to run. Yesterday as he walked across the damp grass to the track, these shoes almost Disintegrated! I don’t know if it’s bad glue, bad stitches, bad quality or what but they literally fell apart!! DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: James P. Kennon

customer_reviews.title: True to size, comfortable bounce cusion
customer_reviews.text: I bought size 11 , it is true to size but I wanna recommend 1/2 bigger size for wide footer. It is bounce cushion very comfortable. I like it
customer_reviews.author: Young min Yang

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for the style. I dont play basketball anymore They look very good and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Normally Adidas are perfect for my wide over-pronating feet, right out the box. This shoe had an unusually tight toe-box for me. After a couple wears, it got better. Their ankle support is awesome for those who have "spaghetti ankles". Good for indoor and outdoor environments. Worth the $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Remus1913

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my 16 year old son and he loves them. They fit great and look awesome, no issues to report.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Have Some Tact..
customer_reviews.text: They were cheap so it's whatever and I needed shoes bad.. But d***, take care of your product.. Box was falling apart when I got it, shoes were crushed and deformed, no cardboard or balled up paper insert in the toe to maintain form, glue on the toe that I was luckily able to peel off with almost no damage.. Do better guys. I'd like a discount as I paid for a pair of shoes that looked like the photo not a crushed pair of shoes that I had to re-shape and wear like bed room slippers somthey would re-form.. REDICULOUS.
customer_reviews.author: Mic Breeze

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 13 year old and ended up giving them to my 17 year old who says the fit is funny and it fills like you are sliding your heel into a cup or cuff. (17 year old size 11 and 13 year old size 12). They are both ball players however they love the adidas brand and were very disappointed, but as luck would have it I wear a men's 11 the fit is good I did find the issues with the heel a bit weird but not enough not to wear and enjoy. Thank you Amazon #mysensitiveteenagers

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.text: I wear size 11 in all shoes and bought a size 11. Fits is a little close. I wear with thick socks. I wear this for basketball.

customer_reviews.text: The shoes don’t have a very good grip. When there is a little dust on the basketball court, the shoes are very slippery.

customer_reviews.text: It is a great product, very comfortable and you really feel your ankles protected. I’m giving 4 stars because they sent the wrong color at first, I returned the product and sent me the correct color two days later.

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Pro Vision Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: These men's basketball shoes combine a streetball-inspired look with modern details. They're designed with a midfoot cage for a locked-down feel, and they have flexible midsole cushioning for soft comfort as you attack the paint. The rubber outsole provides extra grip for quick cuts and pivots on the blacktop.
feature_bullets: Textile upper with tailored collar and ripstop midfoot cage
Bounce cushioning provides enhanced comfort and flexibility
